nodes.text: The Anaxes asteroid belt, also known as the Anaxes asteroid ring, was an asteroid field located in the Azure sector of the galaxy's Core Worlds. It was created when a cataclysmic event destroyed the planet Anaxes after the end of the Clone Wars. One of its asteroids, the planetoid PM-1203, housed Fort Anaxes, an abandoned Galactic Republic military installation that had been located on Anaxes' surface during the Clone Wars.

The Anaxes asteroid belt, otherwise known as the Anaxes asteroid ring, was an asteroid field located in the Azure system of the Core Worlds' Azure sector, at grid square L-9 on the Standard Galactic Grid. Situated along the Perlemian Trade Route, the asteroid field was formed from the remains of the destroyed planet Anaxes and was home to colonies of fyrnocks.

Despite being an asteroid field, several asteroids within maintained trace atmospheres, including PM-1203, a planetoid that contained Fort Anaxes, a former Galactic Republic military base. The field was also home to another planetoid known as PM-6986, which housed a former Separatist stronghold.

The Anaxes asteroid belt first appeared in "Out of Darkness," the seventh episode of the first season of the Star Wars Rebels television series, which originally aired on November 3, 2014. The asteroid belt was later identified in Dawn of Rebellion, a 2018 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. It was alternatively identified in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia as the Anaxes asteroid ring.
